comments:
Can't preview PDF when clicking the button in web view
Steps to reproduce:
     1.run attached design file
     2.preivew in web viewer
     3.click the button in the web viewer window and a message "The file is damaged and could not be repaired" displayed.
Expected results:display properply in PDF

Actual :it displayed properly when using PDF preview directly ,while previewing PDF through clicking the button in web view,a wrong message displayed.
